title: City Places
description: City Places is a nonfiction book about various places typically found in a city and what people do in those places. Detailed illustrations support the text.
meta: city, park, parking garage, place, skyscraper, stadium, store, zoo
Use the strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to make sense of the text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Capitalization and Punctuation : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
